long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily add websites on TeachTag!

1) Click on this extension while you're on the website you want to add
2) It will automatically take you to the Add a Tag page for the website you're on
3) That's it!

While you're on the Add a Tag page, we will automatically pull images and information from the website. TeachTag will also automatically set the subject and grade level based on your TeachTag profile. You can edit any of this information, and you also have the option of setting a standard.

https://www.teachtag.com/

About TeachTag: We're an organizational tool for K-12 teachers. We help teachers organize their teaching resources by subject, grade level, and academic standard. These resources can be anything from files to internet links. TeachTag is also a content discovery platform, so teachers can share their favorite resources which are easily discoverable.
